txt.en: Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.\n\nYour mission is to recover trinkets stolen from the Dwarves of the Iron Garrison.
Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath at Akrâz-zahar.
Mission: Trinkets of the Lost Garrison

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'After slaying a few unwary Orcs, our scouts in the Dimrill Dale discovered the Orcs of Moria are carrying trinkets belonging to the Dwarves of the Iron Garrison. This is a grave insult, and it will not be borne by me - or any other proud dwarf for that matter!

'You are to travel to the Dimrill Dale and recover these trinkets from the Orcs of Moria!'
Complete 'Mission: Trinkets of the Lost Garrison'
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
Your mission is to recover trinkets stolen from the Dwarves of the Iron Garrison.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and travel to the Dimrill Dale.

'You have my thanks, [placeholder].\n\n'Many dwarves were lost when the Iron Garrison was driven from Moria, and I will not let their efforts... or their sacrifices be forgotten. I shall see that these are returned to their kin at once!'
